title: Which song you think is copied from an older song and many have not realised? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are some songs for which I believe I don't even have to post the original version:  Macarena   Anu Malik took it to the next level by copying the famous tune - Happy Birthday   Hotel California  The Godfather Theme Song   Raindrops Keep Falling on my Head - BJ Thomas    All I Wanna Say  - Micheal Jackson   Here are some of the lesser known songs and their copied version Original: Nights in White Satin  Copied: Kuch Kasme hai jawaa   Original : El Condor Pasa - Simon & Garfunkel   Copied: Teri Chahat ke Siwa   Original : Last Christman - Wham    Copied: Dil Mera Churaya Kyo   Original: Oh My Darling Clementine    Copied version: Ae dil hai mushkil    Original: Deep Forest - Deep Forest    Copied: Gupt Title Song (also the lead line is copied from Tubular Bells by Mike Oldfield)   Original : Who Killed the Radio Star   Copied: Koi Yaha Nache Nache    Original: Paranue - Serapis Bey   Copied: Barana De

I was shattered when I found this.The intro of one of my favourite songs by my favourite artist Eddie Vedder, featuring in the soundtrack of one of my favourite films, turned out to be shockingly similiar to a French song from 1960s by Francoise Hardy. One friend in fact quipped "Vedder to Pritam Nikla" (Eddie Vedder turned out to be Pritam, an Indian music director infamous for plagiarism).Sigh!   Guaranteed by Eddie Vedder
